resources.string: Accept to send data in a periodic manner to the admin server

1. We are going to collect mobile app usage information using this app.
 2. No information about user identity will be collected.
 3. The data will not be used for any commercial purpose without prior notice.
 4. This is to facilitate research in mobile privacy.
 5. You can contact the developer at prajitdas[AT]gmail[DOT]com.
 6. By clicking on the accept button below you agree to provide data periodically for research purposes.
 7. Data upload will only be done in presence of a WiFi connection to ensure no charges occur on your bill due to the data collection process.
No permission information is available for this app or this app doesn\'t use any permissions!
